name: basketwork
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the making of baskets and other objects by twisting together thin strips of wood, plastic, etc.: a basketwork chair
Image Source/Photodisc/GettyImages
objects made by twisting together thin strips of wood, plastic, etc.: You will find vendors selling pottery, basketwork, and T-shirts.
